00154 class c_camera
00155 {
00156     private:
00157         void _cam_frustum_jitter_fov(GLdouble, GLdouble, GLdouble, GLdouble, GLdouble);
00158         void make_matrix();
00159 
00160         GLmatrix make_view_matrix(const vect3, const vect3, const vect3, const float);
00161         GLmatrix make_projection_matrix(const float, const float, const float);
00162 
00163     public:
00164         vect3 m_pos;      // The camera position
00165         vect3 m_trackpos; // The camera target
00166 
00167         float m_movex;    // for x axis movement
00168         float m_movey;    // for y axis movement
00169         float m_movez;    // for z axis movement
00170 
00171         float m_roll;     // Camera roll angle
00172         float m_factor;   // scrolling factor
00173 
00174         GLmatrix m_projection;

00176         GLmatrix m_view;
00177

00189 class c_renderlist
00190 {
00191     private:
00192     public:
00193         int     m_num_totl;                 // Number to render, total
00194         Uint32  m_totl[MAXMESHRENDER];      // List of which to render, total
00195 
00196         int     m_num_shine;                // ..., reflective
00197         Uint32  m_shine[MAXMESHRENDER];     // ..., reflective
00198 
00199         int     m_num_reflc;                // ..., has reflection
00200         Uint32  m_reflc[MAXMESHRENDER];     // ..., has reflection
00201 
00202         int     m_num_norm;                 // ..., not reflective, has no reflection
00203         Uint32  m_norm[MAXMESHRENDER];      // ..., not reflective, has no reflection
00204 
00205         int     m_num_watr;                 // ..., water
00206         Uint32  m_watr[MAXMESHRENDER];      // ..., water
00207         Uint32  m_watr_mode[MAXMESHRENDER];
00208 
00209         bool build();
00210 };
